ItemName: Treasure Map Indicating the Location of Ignis Aureliae
ItemBGDesc: In Mr. Xiyan's story, this is a treasure map recording the location of the Ignis Aureliae. But in your eyes, this is just an Alchemy Commission map with a random circle drawn on it. "It is said that 'A Sword Is Mightier When Hidden.' He therefore hid the Ignis Aureliae away from potential thieves before he was incarcerated." "There it is! The classic adventure story trope where a century-old treasure map just gets discovered out of nowhere!"
